sentences.en: A more serious charge against van Loon was the sloppiness of his scholarship.
sentences.cn: 对房龙的一项更严肃的指控是他在学问上的马虎.

sentences.en: Fu taught in primary schools, loon majestic, but the speech will be a nervous stutter.
sentences.cn: 阿福在小学任教, 长得人高马大威风凛凛, 只是一紧张讲话就会口吃.

sentences.en: Late evening dew glistened on every bush and soon the loon's call would across the water.
sentences.cn: 再晚些,灌木上的露珠开始闪烁,不久,潜水鸟的叫声就会在水面上回荡起来.

sentences.en: The following story is based upon the Bible. It was rewritten by Hendrik Willem Van Loon.
sentences.cn: 下面的故事以《圣经》为基础, 由亨德里克·威廉·冯·龙(房龙)写成.

sentences.en: The head of Power's department, Anne Carroll Moore, came to share her admiration of van Loon.
sentences.cn: 保尔所在部门的领导安妮?卡洛尔?莫尔与保尔一起分享了对房龙的敬仰之情.

sentences.en: The less the lame loon learn on its little lame leg, the less the loon limped.
sentences.cn: 跛足的笨蛋对它的小跛足依靠得越少, 笨蛋跛行就越少.

sentences.en: To van Loon, human achievement mattered above all things.
sentences.cn: 对房龙来说, 人类的成就比一切都重要.

sentences.en: Van Loon did not shy away from controversial statements.
sentences.cn: 房龙并不回避富有争议的言论.

sentences.en: Van Loon had joined the Unitarian Laymen's League in 1924.
sentences.cn: 房龙于1924年加入一神教俗世信徒联盟.

sentences.en: Who is that loon over there?
Why are loon hatchlings in Wisconsin emerging deformed from their eggs?
sentences.cn: 为什么维斯康新州的潜鸟幼儿从它们蛋中孵化就是畸形?
